com.artemis

Class EntitySystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.artemis.BaseSystem
      • com.artemis.EntitySystem
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DelayedEntityProcessingSystem, EntityProcessingSystem, IntervalEntitySystem, VoidEntitySystem

    public abstract class EntitySystem
extends BaseSystem
implements EntitySubscription.SubscriptionListener
    Entity system for iterating a entities matching a single Aspect. Likely the most common type of system.
    Author:
    Arni Arent

      • disabled

        @Deprecated
public final void disabled(Entity e)
        Deprecated. 
        Call when an entity interesting to the system was disabled.

        If the disabled entity is in this system it will be removed

        Parameters:
        e - the disabled entity

      • enabled

        @Deprecated
public final void enabled(Entity e)
        Deprecated. 
        Call when an entity interesting to the system was (re)enabled.

        If the enabled entity is of interest, in will be (re)inserted.

        Parameters:
        e - the (re)enabled entity
